timeline.message: Rename OpenTelemetrySdkBuilder.build to buildAndRegisterGlobal and add non-registering version.

timeline.bodyText: I still think that just calling this build() would be fine. If you're looking at your auto-complete options, it should be obvious that the one that has AndRegisterGlobal() on the end of it would do what it says, and, hence, this one wouldn't.
timeline.author: jkwatson
